name: Bolt of Zeus
description:
After being discarded by his master, Bolt swore to take revenge. For that he has to fight through severeal monsters to journey back into the clouds.

Controls:
WASD - Move
SPACE - Jump
Left Mouse Button - Attack
123 - Toggle Attack
Esc - Menu

Credits:
GodTGamer / Dominic Scherer - Coding
Tazzy - Sound Design, Art, Animation
Ellowyn - Voice Acting, Level Design, Art
cawfee_art: Art, Animation, Level Design
hvairn: Level Design, Art, Animation
myey: Art, Level Design
cdan-art: UI Design, Art, Animation, Level Design
Lighty: Art, Animation
